item.title: MVC Application using Spring Boot and Thymeleaf
item.description:

If you want to understand more about MVC architecture, go through this article.

item.title: MVC Application using Spring Boot and JSP
item.description:
In this article, I will be developing a Model-View-Controller (MVC) application using Spring Boot and JSP for the Microservice Application that was created in Microservice Using Spring Boot, Hibernate and H2 Database, which exposes the REST APIs as a backend application.

However, in this article, I will create an User Interface (UI) for that application using JSP in Spring Boot, in order to make Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture work.

item.title: Microservice Using Spring Boot, Hibernate and H2 Database
item.description:
In this article, I will develop a Microservice Application using Spring Boot Framework and H2 Database and expose all CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) Operations as the REST APIs.

Spring Boot Framework will serve as back-end server and I will be using Relational Database known as H2 Database, it is also known as an Embedded Java Database, for persisting(storing) the data.
